title: [BUG REPORT] Kindred passive not stacking
body: Had a few instances where Kindred's passive would not stack i played 2 customs and 1 normal as soon as i reached 5 stacks it would not reach any higher. I made sure there was bots in the customs to test this but still no stacks

replies.body:
You are aware that:
1. Kindred can no longer hunt jungle creeps after 5 or 6 stacks.
2. Kindred's mark on champions takes 8 seconds to arm.
I had no idea there was an arming time on her passive, so i can't just use it when i start the gank?

I've had Kindred's passive not give me my first stack after smiting a scuttler hunt around 3:00. Only a hunters machete in inventory and no contest on the camp. This happened in a team builder game on 10/31/15.
